ActorFrame.W1Command: %function(self) DzCheckMetalClassicTaro = self:GetZ(); if DzCheckMetalClassicTaro > 0 then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P1Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P1'); else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2'); end else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2'); end end
ActorFrame.W2Command: %function(self) DzCheckMetalClassicTaro = self:GetZ(); if DzCheckMetalClassicTaro > 0 then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P1Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P1'); else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2'); end else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2'); end end
ActorFrame.W3Command: %function(self) DzCheckMetalClassicTaro = self:GetZ(); if DzCheckMetalClassicTaro > 0 then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W3P1Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W3P1'); else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W3P2Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W3P2'); end else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W3P2Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W3P2'); end end

ActorFrame.W6Command: %function(self) DzCheckMetalClassicTaro = self:GetZ(); if DzCheckMetalClassicTaro > 0 then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP1Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP1'); else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2'); end else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2Down'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2'); end end

ActorFrame.InitCommand: %function(self) receptor_x_1_4 = 0 receptor_y_1_4 = 0 receptor_z_1_4 = 0 receptor_rotationx_1_4 = 0 receptor_rotationy_1_4 = 0 receptor_rotationz_1_4 = 0 receptor_zoomx_1_4 = 1 receptor_zoomy_1_4 = 1 receptor_zoomz_1_4 = 1 receptor_fadetop_1_4 = 0 receptor_fadebottom_1_4 = 0 receptor_fadeleft_1_4 = 0 receptor_faderight_1_4 = 0 receptor_croptop_1_4 = 0 receptor_cropbottom_1_4 = 0 receptor_cropleft_1_4 = 0 receptor_cropright_1_4 = 0 self:sleep(0); self:queuecommand('Update') end
ActorFrame.UpdateCommand: %function(self) self:x(receptor_x_1_4) self:y(receptor_y_1_4) self:z(receptor_z_1_4) self:rotationx(receptor_rotationx_1_4) self:rotationy(receptor_rotationy_1_4) self:rotationz(receptor_rotationz_1_4) self:zoomx(receptor_zoomx_1_4) self:zoomy(receptor_zoomy_1_4) self:zoomz(receptor_zoomz_1_4) self:fadetop(receptor_fadetop_1_4) self:fadebottom(receptor_fadebottom_1_4) self:fadeleft(receptor_fadeleft_1_4) self:faderight(receptor_faderight_1_4) self:croptop(receptor_croptop_1_4) self:cropbottom(receptor_cropbottom_1_4) self:cropleft(receptor_cropleft_1_4) self:cropright(receptor_cropright_1_4) self:sleep(0.05); self:queuecommand('Update') end
